extDesc.message: The reading list that syncs to the cloud.

msgUnavail.message: The selected action is not available right now.

deleteBkmk.description: Address bar button caption for deleting reading list item

deleteBkmkCxt.description: Context menu item for deleting reading list item

errAddBkmk.message: This page can't be added to Read Next.
errAddBkmk.description: Error notification that appears when attempting to add an unsupported URL to the reading list

srchBoxHint.description: Hint text appearing on empty search box in reading list sidebar

emptyInstr.message: Click “Add Current Tab” to add to the reading list.

emptyInstrEx.message: Click “Add Current Tab” or click in the address bar.

reauthzNotifcn.message: Read Next needs to reauthorize your $1 account. Click here to reauthorize.
reauthzNotifcn.description: Reauthorization notification - appears when user needs to reauthorize their cloud file host account

reauthzMsgBar.message: Read Next needs to reauthorize your $1 account
reauthzMsgBar.description: Reauthorization message bar - appears in the reading list sidebar when user needs to reauthorize their cloud file host account

mnuPrefs.description: Browser toolbar context menu item for opening extension preferences page

mnuPrefsWin.description: Browser toolbar context menu item for opening extension preferences page (Windows only)

prefsTitle.description: Extension preferences page title (appears on tab and window title bar)

prefsTitleWin.description: Extension preferences page title on Windows (appears on tab and window title bar)

prefsHdgWin.description: Extension preferences page heading on Windows

prefsHdgSync.description: Section heading in extension preferences page

noSync.message: Sync your reading list to the cloud using Dropbox.

connWizTitle1.description: Cloud file service connection wizard in extension preferences page

connWizTitle2.description: Cloud file service connection wizard in extension preferences page

connWizTitle3.description: Cloud file service connection wizard in extension preferences page

wizAuthzNetErr.message: Read Next needs to connect to the network. Check your network connection, or try again later.

wizAuthzInstr1.message: You'll be taken to $1 where you can log in and confirm permissions for Read Next.
wizAuthzInstr1.description: You'll be taken to <name of cloud file service, e.g. Dropbox> where you can log in and confirm permissions for Read Next.

wizAuthzInstr2.message: Make sure to select the option to grant access to your cloud drive.  This will allow Read Next to sync your reading list.

wizAuthzInterrupt.message: Authorization to $1 didn't finish successfully.  Do you want to try again?
wizAuthzInterrupt.description: Authorization to <name of cloud file service, e.g. Dropbox> didn't finish successfully.  Do you want to try again?

wizAuthzSuccs.message: Read Next has started syncing your reading list to $1.  It may take a moment to finish.
wizAuthzSuccs.description: Read Next has started syncing your reading list to <name of cloud file service, e.g. Dropbox>.  It may take a moment to finish.

wizSetupRem.message: Repeat this setup on your other devices where your reading list should be synced with.

disconnTitle.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect Read Next from $1?
disconnTitle.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect Read Next from <name of cloud file service, e.g. Dropbox>?

disconnConf.message: Your reading list will still be saved to your device, but it will no longer sync to the cloud.

prefsHdgInteg.description: Section heading in extension preferences page

prefCxtMenuBtn.message: Show menu item in the context menu

prefHdgSidebar.description: Section heading in extension preferences page

prefCloseTabAfterAdd.message: Close tab after adding to Read Next

closeTabAfterAddDesc.message: You can also do this by right-clicking in the address bar and then selecting "Add and Close Tab."

reauthzRetry.message: Reauthorization to $1 didn't finish successfully.  Do you want to try again?
reauthzRetry.description: Reauthorization to <name of cloud file service, e.g. Dropbox> didn't finish successfully.  Do you want to try again?
